subject: Sports Injuries
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Red Bulls striker Juan Agudelo sustained a torn meniscus in his left knee during the under-23 team’s 6-0 win over Cuba in its opening game of Olympic qualifying in the Concacaf region.
snippet: Red Bulls striker Juan Agudelo sustained a torn meniscus in his left knee during the under-23 team’s 6-0 win over Cuba in its opening game of Olympic qualifying in the Concacaf region.
